definitions: a pair of equal and oppositely charged or magnetized poles separated by a distance.
shortDefinitions: pair of equal and oppositely charged or magnetized poles separated by distance

definitions: an antenna consisting of a horizontal metal rod with a connecting wire at its center.
shortDefinitions: antenna consisting of horizontal metal rod with connecting wire at its center

definitions: a molecule in which a concentration of positive electric charge is separated from a concentration of negative charge.
shortDefinitions: molecule in which concentration of positive electric charge is separated from concentration of negative charge
